name: timeless - antique brass pocket watch necklace.
description:
( oh, hello friend )

antique brass pocket watch pendant with a lovely roman numeral front face design, and circle in the middle that reveals the watch behind. a dark brass flower and small powder blue bead accent this unique piece.

love the functionality of this piece, clock does work. clock pendant measures about 1" in diameter. it measures 1.5" from the top of the clock to the bottom. charms hang on a 28" chain.

for battery replacement, i recommend taking it to a watch repair shop. can include an extra battery for only $3.50!
